# hasItemsConforming(toTypeIdentifiers:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether at least one drag item in the session conforms to at least one of the specified UTIs.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func hasItemsConforming(toTypeIdentifiers typeIdentifiers: [String]) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **typeIdentifiers**: An array of uniform type identifier (UTI) strings.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if a drag item in the session conforms to any UTI in the specified array; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Checking for drag items

- **canLoadObjects(ofClass:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether at least one drag item in the session can create an instance of the specified class.
- **items**: An array of drag items in the drag session or drop session.
